title: No permission shall be required for provision of safety grills to window/ventilator
clause_text: No permission shall be required for provision of safety grills to window/ventilator. No permission shall be required for repairs to the Existing Consumer/Distribution/Receiving Substation of the BEST/Electric Supply Company. However, no addition/alteration shall be permissible without the approval of the Commissioner.

source_pdf.text_snippet: No permission shall be required for provision of safety grills to window/ventilator. No permission shall be required for repairs to the Existing Consumer/Distribution/Receiving Substation of the BEST/
